thread.title: Rapids select Denver Pioneers midfielder Sam Hamilton No. 15 overall in SuperDraft
thread.title_full: Rapids select Denver Pioneers midfielder Sam Hamilton No. 15 overall in SuperDraft

author: Daniel Boniface
title: Rapids select Denver Pioneers midfielder Sam Hamilton No. 15 overall in SuperDraft
text:
January 6, 2017 Kortne Forde, Ricardo Perez sign homegrown deals with Colorado Rapids 
Hamilton was the Pioneers team captain in 2015-16, as the team posted back-to-back undefeated regular seasons â€” a first in college soccer since 1977-78. He played a defensive midfield role for one of the stingiest defenses in college soccer. The Pioneers allowed just 0.40 goals per game in 2015 and 0.52 goals per game in 2016. 
Last week, the Rapids signed Hamiltonâ€™s Denver teammate, defender Kortne Ford, to a Homegrown contract. 
Hamilton was selected two slots after his Pioneers teammate, defender Reagan Dunk, who went to Real Salt Lake. 
The Rapids continued to build depth for their defense in the second round, selecting Syracuse defender Liam Callahan with the second pick (No. 24 overall). ðŸŽ¥ of #15 pick Sam Hamilton pic.twitter.com/iMnyGEefDN
